jobDescription: Job Duties:Responsible for analyzing and forecasting all aspects of supply chain of semiconductor materials and/or equipment.Analyzing Semiconductor equipment and material market data and forecast supply & demand.Continuous monitoring of Semiconductor Equipment and material market and ongoing intelligence gathering.Leads strategically critical projects that bring exceptional value to the company through key supplier relationships, cost/benefit financial analysis and supplier quality management.Prepares required reports; provides detailed analysis of equipment and materials.Requirements:Minimum of a Bachelor’s degree (B.A./B.S.) in related field or equivalent.Minimum 10 years related in marketing and/or sales of Semiconductor equipment or materials suppliers experience or equivalent.Proven ability to handle multiple projects and meet deadlines.Strong interpersonal, organizational, problem-solving, and analytical skills.Ability to deal effectively with a diversity of individuals at all organizational levels.Good judgment with the ability to make timely and sound decisions.Working knowledge of data collection, data analysis, evaluation, and scientific method.Bilingual in Korean and English is preferred.
